My little projects

This page is a collection of little project I made when I has nothing to do or when I saw strange or funny things. Here are all the projects which are to little to be put in a new git repository but I think they are interesting to see. You can see the source code of each projects on git hub whith the link.

flip clock

I first saw this flip clock on youtube and I think that this is a good idea to make my own version of it.
My concern is that this is not a good idea to make a flip clock becauthe after, I can take the code and customize it to display whatever I want like nubers of sell for a merchandising website, a countdown to a specific date. Or whatever I want.

See on GitHub
